#include <string>
#include <vector>
#include <map>
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
map<char, int> mp;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int x;
        cin>>x;
        
        if(x%2!=0||x==0)
            cout<<"No"<<endl;
        else
            cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
    }
}
